You guys should check out the entries from previous years
http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html
go to "Fan Fiction" near the bottom...I skimmed 2 stories very 
quickly and the stories seemed to presume that the readers have 
atleast a background on the era to appreciate the story.... honestly 
I know many writers from ff.net who could definately compete!

and right now the prize money is at $36...you can buy the director's 
cut of RK Reflections (which now has the deleted scenes of S.H.)  
(^_^)
